tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor diagnosed my problem of the auto immune disease Sarcoidosis in 2012 and helped me handle the multiple problems through conservative treatment. He avoided steroids which was praiseworthy. I have complete faith in my doctor and I am managing my disease satisfactorily.

I would recommend him in a heartbeat! if you don't want to get further scared by long lists of tests that docs normally give - he's your doctor. Very hands on and very to the point. He knows what he's talking about and that's very reassuring.

*** ** ******* *************** I booked appointment from meerut to visit in Delhi Max Saket. His assistant called on appointment 11.30 during my office time day to visit early  by 4.00 instead of scheduled appointment of 6.00 pm . I tried all my possibilities to reach Delhi and inform the assistant that after entering in Delhi I will be possibly reach by 4.20 . So as per his discussion the doctor refused by saying that he has a meeting. So what about a patient who is travelling from a long way for getting treatment and suggested that come to Gurgram centre tomorrow. Is it that easy for him to just cancel the appointment. Or if he would have at his personal clinic he would be visiting for an hour for getting the patient cum customers. ******* ************** *** ** ******** ******** *** ******* ** ********** ***** ******** * **** ******** **** * **** *******
Doctor was not friendly. He didn't  listen to me and was not interested at all in seeing my reports.totally dissatisfied.

Havent seen a doctor even close to  IMPATIENT and RUDE like Dr Naveen Kishore.  ** **** ***** ** ******* *** ***** *** ** ***** *** **** ******* *** ********* ** ***** *******  And if you ask a question , he shows you the door .
*** ******** ** **** ** ** ** ** *** **** ********* ****** **** ** **** ****** *** *** * ********* *** ***** ******* *** ********* 
I would never recommed anyone to visit. Total of timewaste.
NO WONDER ALL REVIEWS HERE ARE THE SAME.

Dr Nevin Kishore is rude, arrogant, uses objectionable language, impatient, does not pay attention to patient's past history, keeps interrupting and making judgemental comments: *** ** ********** ******** ** ****** ********** *** ****** ** ********* ***
